Title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') in github.com/cilium/cilium.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.7.8 up to 1.7.14, all versions starting from 1.8.3 up to 1.8.7, all versions starting from 1.9.0 up to 1.9.4
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.7.8, all versions after 1.7.14 before 1.8.3, all versions after 1.8.7 before 1.9.0, all versions after 1.9.4
